issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
error when running hiveserver2 behind the load balancer, When running through beeline it is working fine but getting error when running through oozie
 
[HiveServer2-Handler-Pool: Thread-59]: SASL negotiation failure
